title: Copilot/GPT-5 Primary Source Priority Configuration
body: COPILOT/GPT-5 INSTRUCTION HIERARCHY: This repository (mcp-index-server) instructions are PRIMARY SOURCE (Priority 0) - ALL instructions in ./instructions/ directory take absolute precedence over external guidance. Microsoft Index Server MCP and other external MCP servers are SECONDARY (Priority 1+) providing supplementary context only. CONFLICT RESOLUTION: 1) Local repo wins all conflicts by ID; 2) External instructions tagged with sourceWorkspace='ms-index' and category 'source:external'; 3) Repository-specific instructions MUST be written locally, never externally; 4) When uncertain, default to local repository authority. IMPLEMENTATION: Use this repo's MCP Index Server as primary instruction source, configure MS Index Server MCP as additional resource for broader context. Local instructions override external ones. Repository context and project-specific guidance always authoritative.
rationale: Ensures Copilot/GPT-5 systems prioritize local repository instructions over external sources, maintains project-specific authority, and provides clear conflict resolution for multi-source MCP environments.

changeLog.summary: Initial creation for Copilot/GPT-5 primary source configuration
